Detailed Description

The ColorNodeServer is the color base class from which implementation should be derived from

virtual void DepthSense::Core::ColorNodeServer::initialize ( )
protectedvirtual

Initialize the node.

This method creates and sets up the resources needed to operate the node. In addition, it configures the node with the default configuration.

As the node initialization is not performed automatically in the constructor, user classes are responsible for calling this method explicitly prior to operating the node.

Reimplemented from DepthSense::Core::NodeServer.
